lead_paragraph: FEINMAN--Sheldon, 89, on January 27, devoted husband of the late Beverly and Liz, beloved father of Andrew (Aviva) and Joshua (Debra); adoring grandfather of Amanda and Melissa. A special man who exemplified perseverance and positive attitude, he will be missed by all. 1/3
